eu.esu.mobilecontrol2.sdk

Class Throttle

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.esu.mobilecontrol2.sdk.Throttle

  • public final class Throttle
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for using the Mobile Control2 throttle.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String INTENT_BIND_SERVICE
      Intent used to bind the throttle service.
      static int MSG_BUTTON_DOWN
      Callback that is invoked when the button is pressed.
      static int MSG_BUTTON_UP
      Callback that is invoked when the button is released.
      static int MSG_MOVE_TO
      Command to change the throttle position.
      static int MSG_POSITION_CHANGED
      Callback that is invoked when the position has changed by user input, Message.arg1 contains the new throttle position.
      static int MSG_REGISTER_CLIENT
      Command to the service to register a client.
      static int MSG_SET_ZERO_POSITION
      Command to set the zero position of the throttle.
      static int MSG_UNREGISTER_CLIENT
      Command to the service to remove a registered client from the service.
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_PACKAGE
      The package mobile control II package URI.

    • Field Detail

      • MSG_REGISTER_CLIENT

        public static final int MSG_REGISTER_CLIENT
        Command to the service to register a client. Callbacks are delivered to the messenger defined in Message.replyTo.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSG_UNREGISTER_CLIENT

        public static final int MSG_UNREGISTER_CLIENT
        Command to the service to remove a registered client from the service. The Message.replyTo field must be set to the messenger that shall be removed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSG_MOVE_TO

        public static final int MSG_MOVE_TO
        Command to change the throttle position. Set Message.arg1 to the position. Range: 0 - 255.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSG_SET_ZERO_POSITION

        public static final int MSG_SET_ZERO_POSITION
        Command to set the zero position of the throttle. Set Message.arg1 to the position. Range: 0 - 255.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSG_POSITION_CHANGED

        public static final int MSG_POSITION_CHANGED
        Callback that is invoked when the position has changed by user input, Message.arg1 contains the new throttle position. Range: 0 - 126
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSG_BUTTON_DOWN

        public static final int MSG_BUTTON_DOWN
        Callback that is invoked when the button is pressed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MSG_BUTTON_UP

        public static final int MSG_BUTTON_UP
        Callback that is invoked when the button is released.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_PACKAGE

        public static final java.lang.String SERVICE_PACKAGE
        The package mobile control II package URI.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INTENT_BIND_SERVICE

        public static final java.lang.String INTENT_BIND_SERVICE
        Intent used to bind the throttle service.
        See Also:
